entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 11.
